entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Alliston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Egbert 2:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 1.4°C
Wind: ESE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with drizzle. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
